short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pixel Gun 3D Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Pixel Gun 3D background. Pixel Gun 3D wallpaper theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Change your Pixel Gun 3D wallpaper with every new tab.
2. Choose a random or favorite Pixel Gun 3D background in the wallpaper selector.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media.
5. Automatic display of the current date and time.
6. Create new notes for task management.
7. Shortcut to frequently visited websites.
8. Quick access to your bookmarks.
9. Add shortcuts to websites for faster navigation.
10. Immediate entry to Google apps.
11. Instant access to additional themes.
12. Share easily on social media platforms.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. Quick access to gaming portals.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on the Pixel Gun 3D tab.
